business_create_job.long_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs. Available for US businesses.
business_create_job.long_name: Count of businesses creating new jobs
business_create_job.short_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs

job_creation_active.long_description: Count of new jobs created by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year). Available for US businesses.
job_creation_active.long_name: Count of new jobs created by active businesses
job_creation_active.short_description: Count of new jobs created by active businesses
job_creation_active.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by active businesses in {region_name}.

job_creation_new.long_description: Count of new jobs created by new businesses (a new business is a company newly created or has moved to the region). Available for US businesses.
job_creation_new.long_name: Count of new jobs created by new businesses
job_creation_new.short_description: Count of new jobs created by new businesses
job_creation_new.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by new businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_creation_active.long_description: Percent of new jobs created by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year): \[perc\_job\_creation\_active=\frac{jobs\_created\_by\_active\_businesses}{all\_jobs\_created}\]. Available for US businesses.
perc_job_creation_active.long_name: Job creation rate by active businesses
perc_job_creation_active.short_description: Job creation rate by active businesses
perc_job_creation_active.statement: {value} percent of new jobs created by active businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_creation_new.long_description: Percent of new jobs created by new businesses (a new business is a company newly created or has moved to the region): \[perc\_job\_creation\_new=\frac{jobs\_created\_by\_new\_businesses}{all\_jobs\_created}\]. Available for US businesses.
perc_job_creation_new.long_name: Job creation rate by new businesses
perc_job_creation_new.short_description: Job creation rate by new businesses
perc_job_creation_new.statement: {value} percent of new jobs created by new businesses in {region_name}.

total_job_creation.long_description: Total new jobs created by all businesses. Available for US businesses.
total_job_creation.long_name: Total new jobs created by all businesses
total_job_creation.short_description: Total new jobs created by all businesses
total_job_creation.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by businesses in {region_name}.

business_destruction_job.long_description: Total businesses industry cutting jobs. Available for US businesses.

job_destruction_active.long_description: Count of jobs cutted by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year). Available for US businesses.
job_destruction_active.long_name: Count of jobs cutted by active businesses
job_destruction_active.short_description: Count of jobs cutted by active businesses
job_destruction_active.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by active businesses in {region_name}.

job_destruction_exit.long_description: Count of jobs cutted by closed businesses (a closed business is a company that stoped its activities or leaving the region). Available for US businesses.
job_destruction_exit.long_name: Count of jobs cutted by closed businesses
job_destruction_exit.short_description: Count of jobs cutted by closed businesses
job_destruction_exit.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by closed businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_destruction_active.long_description: Percent of jobs cutted by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year): \[perc\_job\_destruction\_active=\frac{jobs\_eliminated\_by\_active\_businesses}{all\_jobs\_eliminated}\]. Available for US businesses.
perc_job_destruction_active.long_name: Job destruction rate by active businesses
perc_job_destruction_active.short_description: Job destruction rate by active businesses
perc_job_destruction_active.statement: {value} percent of jobs cutted by active businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_destruction_exit.long_description: Percent of jobs cutted by closed businesses (a closed business is a company that stoped its activities or leaving the region): \[perc\_job\_destruction\_exit=\frac{jobs\_eliminated\_by\_closed\_businesses}{all\_jobs\_eliminated}\]. Available for US businesses.
perc_job_destruction_exit.long_name: Job destruction rate by closed businesses
perc_job_destruction_exit.short_description: Job destruction rate by closed businesses
perc_job_destruction_exit.statement: {value} percent of jobs cutted by closed businesses in {region_name}.

total_job_destruction.long_description: Total jobs cutted by businesses. Available for US businesses.
total_job_destruction.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by businesses in {region_name}.

total_employment.long_description: Count of all jobs. Available for US businesses.
